text:
Hi everyone, I am struggling with creating an App in my app developer account.
To give you a background, I have created almost 4+ app in past. The most recent I created was 20 days back. Now when I click on *create app* button, then I change the name of app, the create button within the app doesn't get enable. Also ClientID and client secrete is empty under Auth section.

Can somebody guide me know what possibly going wrong, it will be very helpful.
Hi everyone, is there anyone here that can help me enroll an account in the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-interest-form|private developer tools beta>?

Hi guys, I need to build a HubSpot public app. However, I'm not sure where to find the documentation about HubSpot app features. I'm particularly interested in having it should in the right pane (Like slack of panda docs). Any idea where can I read about it?
That particular HubSpot extension is called a crm card you can find all the docs for it here: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/extensions/custom-cards>

If you're building this for one portal you could also use developer projects to build out the crm card: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/create-custom-cards-with-projects> but building it this way wouldn't allow you to install it on multiple accounts
